entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is one of the main characters who is trying to move the trunk into the car. He is described as pulling and pushing with Ron and George.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is another main character who is helping Harry and George move the trunk into the car.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is one of the Weasley twins who is helping Harry and Ron move the trunk into the car.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is another Weasley twin who is pulling from inside the car to help move the trunk.

entities.name: hedwig
entities.description: Hedwig is Harry's owl that he forgets in the room.

entities.name: uncle vernon
entities.description: Uncle Vernon is a character who is trying to stop Harry and his friends from moving the trunk into the car.

relationships.description: Harry owns Hedwig, as evidenced by him forgetting her in the room.
Harry and Ron are working together to move the trunk into the car.
Harry and George are also working together to move the trunk into the car.
Ron receives Hedwig's cage from Harry.
Uncle Vernon is trying to stop Harry and his friends from moving the trunk into the car, indicating a conflict between them.
